extDescription.message: This extension will call you to order on a recurring basis, so that you does not lose sight of the essential goals of your life.

options_onseveriteinput_l1.message: Send a notification every [Enter number] minutes

options_onseveriteinput_l2.message: Confirm to continue every [Enter number] minutes.

options_onseveriteinput_l3.message: Block the page after [Enter number] minutes

options_onseveriteinput_l3_2.message:
Block for how many minutes?
[0 = All the day]

options_onseveriteinput_l4.message: Close the browser after [Enter the number] minutes.

options_onseveriteinput_debutquestion.message: Also warn at the beginning of the access to a blacklisted site?

setlist_listenoire_description.message: Put the distracting sites here. To include all websites, write *.*

setlist_listeblanche_description.message: Allows to ignore a specific part included in the blacklist. Also very useful for "allow everything except:"

setlist_messageaddtogroup.message: Enter the name of the new group

setlist_messagegroupnameinvalid.message: A group with that name already exists...

setlist_confirmdeletegroup.message:
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
All the lists it contains will be deleted...

setlist_cantdeletegroup.message: You have only one group: You cannot delete it.

setlist_plusieursurl.message: You can add several urls at the same time by separating them with spaces.

setlist_onbeforeunload.message: You should save your changes before exiting

horaire_description.message: During rest periods, severity levels will not apply.

content_texteaentrer_4.message: I know that what I'm doing right now is important.

content_texteaentrer_5.message: I have to use my time well to succeed.

content_texteaentrer_6.message: There's more than just fun in life.

content_texteaentrer_7.message: I'm sure I want to keep going.

content_texteaentrer_8.message: To be successful, you have to stop talking and start doing.

content_texteaentrer_9.message: I installed this extension to improve my life.

content_texteaentrer_10.message: Is it a good idea to continue?

content_texteaentrer_11.message: I am master of my future.

content_texteaentrer_12.message: The future is built on what I do every day.

content_texteaentrer_13.message: Perseverance in good is the key to success.

content_texteaentrer_14.message: What I'm doing right now is the right thing to do.

content_texteaentrer_15.message: Waste of time is a source of unhappiness.

content_texteaentrer_16.message: I am aware that my time is important.

content_texteaentrer_17.message: I am able to leave this website if it is not important.

content_texteaentrer_18.message: Good time management can make me accomplish wonderful things.

content_texteaentrer_20.message: I like to make a success of my life.

content_notifier_debut.message: You've just entered a blacklisted site.

content_notifier_l1_p1.message: You are on this site since

content_notifier_l2_p1.message: You are on this site since

content_notifier_l2_p4.message: How much more time do you need?
